transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello haan bhaiya samraj electrical se bol raha hu.

Executive: Haan ji sir kaise ho?

Customer: Hello main bol raha hu main bhaiya ye bol raha hu mere paise mere paise wapas karwao mujhe service nahi leni hai ye tum koi wapas nahi kar raha kaun karega?

Executive: Sir dekhiye main aapko bataya gaya tha ki refundable policy nahi hai aur second thing ye hai aapki services running hai sir agar aapko services mein koi issue hai to wo aap bataye sir lead to aa rahi hai na sir aapki?

Customer: Haan?

Executive: Lead to aa rahi hai na sir?

Customer: Lead aa rahi hai unka main kya matlab kya karu un leadon ka mere kaam ki nahi hai na wo.

Executive: To sir aap tenders pe jaiye tenders to aapke kaam ke hote hai na sir aur aap aapka aapki jo category hai usme alag suppliers bhi hai jo kaam kar rahe hain maine aapko dikhaya bhi tha sir hai na aisa to nahi hai sir ki aapko kaam nahi mil sakta.

Aap lead consume to kare aap lead consume hi nahi karte sir chhote order ki kare aap bade order ki kare.

Customer: Lead consume karu aap samjho na wo mere kaam ki nahi hai main kyu consume karu na mujhe kya convince karna chah rahe ho aap?

Executive: Sir aapne jab tak consume hi nahi kari tab tak aapko kaise pata lagega ki wo kaam ki hai ya nahi hai.

Customer: Bhaiya main bekar acha ye baat batao mujhe jab wo mere kaam ki nahi hai to main kyu consume karu na.

Executive: 12 minute pehle hi ek 100 kva ki lead hai aap ise consume karo pehle baki chije chhod do.

100 kva ki lead hai 12 minute pehle hi aayi hai teeno maharashtra se dekho abhi online jaake ek baar.

Customer: Maharashtra mein 100 kva ka transformer le ja raha hai yahan se koi kaun le ja raha hai batao maharashtra ka.

Executive: Sir aap pan india work kar sakte hai aap ek aap ek trader hai to aapko pata hai.

Customer: Pan india aur pan india ye mujhe maharashtra mein kaun le ja raha hai ye isko jo hai.

Executive: Aap aap ek baar baat to kijiye kya pata iska kahin aur ka connection ho aisa bhi to ho sakta hai bina baat kare to kuch pata hi nahi chalega na sir buyers se.

Customer: Are yaar tum ise band kara do mera jo hai na ye tum udhar udhar ki baatein mat karo tum mere se jo hai.

Executive: Sir aap pehle ye lead consume karo jo aayi hui hai 100 kva ki.

Customer: To bhaiya paise wapas karao paise wapas karao mujhe consume manzoom nahi karni hai mera karo dukaan ko band hai sir.

Executive: Sir refundable policy nahi hai sir india mart mein.

Customer: Refundable kyu nahi hai matlab kaam kaam nahi doge to refund to karoge karoge nahi karoge paisa kha jaoge.

Executive: Sir kaam hum de rahe hain sir humne kaha mana kiya hai hum to sir aapko dikha rahe hain faltu ki baatein kar rahe ho fir meri kaam de rahe ho kaam de rahe ho ye faltu ki baatein.

Executive: Sir aapne kaha 100 kva ki lead chahiye aapki profile mein padi hai main online abhi dikha raha hu aapko online.

Customer: Are bhaiya maharashtra mein kaun bhejega up se maharashtra wala transformer bhejega itni cost lag jayegi.

Executive: To sir baat to karo ek baar customer se tabhi to pata chalega aur ye bhi to ye bhi.

Customer: Maharashtra mein kaun global milega 100 kva ka koi transformer nahi ja raha maharashtra mein single transformer kaun lega yahan se.

Executive: Sir up ki bhi lead hai sir main up ki bhi check kar leta hu.

Customer: Sir aisa hai main ye apni apni baatein na karo paise wapas karne ki wo batao kaun wapas karega kaun senior hai kaun junior hai wo wo jo bhi karke adjust karke paise wapas karao.

Executive: Sir jo aap maang rahe hain wo chije hain sir india mart pe aapke alag alag suppliers bhi hai jo kaam kar rahe hain sir.

Customer: Hmm?

Executive: Aur rahi up ki baat to main up ki bhi dekh leta hu.

Customer: Are bhaiya tum paise wapas ki baat karo mujhse bakwas karana tum bahut bakwas karte ho sare log karoge tumhare junior senior sab.

Customer: Kaun senior sabse senior kaun hai is office mein?

Customer: Hmm? Hello

Executive: Sir refundable nahi hai.

Customer: Kisne sabse haan refundable policy nahi hai sir india mart mein kaun ho tum koi koi malik ho koi refundable nahi hai refundable kisne keh diya tum refundable nahi hai kaun hai tumhara senior aadmi usse baat karao aur jo sabse bada senior ho usse baat karana haan wo khan sir se to karana mat wo to wo bekar wo bekar ki baatein karte hain maine ye kar lo wo kar lo wo haan baat karao kaun hai senior person se baat karao tumhare bas ki nahi hai is kaam ko karna tumhara kaam jo hai bewakoof banana logo ko.

Customer: Are suno bhaiya kyu time waste kar rahe ho baat karao.

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Executive: Haan

Executive: Sir dekhiye isme kisi bhi senior ya junior se baat karne ka koi fayda nahi hai theek hai second thing ye hai jo aap bata rahe hain kaun hai india mart ke uska matlab wo director ho kya?

Executive: Sir hum director nahi hai hum employee hai but jo chije hain wo aapko batai ja rahi hai unko paisa diya hai na unka jo jo authorized person hoga usse baat karao.

Executive: Sir jo chije hain wo aapko batai ja rahi hain sir agar aap senior se baat karoge to senior bhi aapko yahi bataenge bataane se kuch nahi ho raha ye kar rahe ho aap sabhi.

Executive: Aur rahi sir lead ki baat to lead hai sir aap aap dekhiye aap consume kijiye unse kaam kijiye.

Customer: Haan faltu ki baatein na kare faltu ki jyada dimag lagayega na aapko mere dhandhe ke bare mein are dekhiye dimag lagane wali hai waise koi bhi baat nahi hai dhandhe ke bare mein jante hain haan jo chije hain wo maine aapko clear kar di hai sir baki koi senior se baat karao senior se baat karao mere paise diye hain sir senior abhi available nahi hai jaise hota hai main ek baar unse baat karke aap aapki baat bhi kara dunga theek hai sir aisa nahi hai main baat nahi karaunga phone me maine koi naukri kar li hai tumse mera paisa deke main bewakoof ki pagalpan ki baatein sun raha hu main jaise jaise available honge main baat kara dunga sir aap theek hai hamari aur aapki koi ladai nahi hai sir are ladai nahi hai tumse kaun sa taiyar kaun karega kaun dosti karega tumse dosti kaun karega jab available jab available honge jab available honge main aapki baat kara dunga suno main koi main main koi pagal aadmi nahi hu jo tumhare sath 24 ghante mein bhi dhandha karta hu 4 paise ka tumhare chakkar mein laga raha hu bilkul bilkul sir to aapko lead aapko lead consume to aapko lead consume karni chahiye sir lead ki baat kar raha hai lead lead lead ya tujhe pata hai nahi hai kuch bhi lead lead kare ja raha hai faltu ki bakwas kare ja raha hai sir jab senior available honge main baat kara dunga theek hai aapko call kara dunga abhi karao senior sir abhi nahi ho payegi sir abhi available nahi hai kyu nahi ho payegi kyu nahi ho payegi bye sir thank you kyu nahi ho payegi tum kya
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a refund for the subscription.

- Claims leads are not useful.

- Wants to speak to a senior person.



Resolution:

- Explained the non-refundable policy.

- Suggested to consume leads before judging.

- Offered to connect with a senior when available.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with senior and call back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, senior
